title: Chapter I - Division of Horse Racing and Pari-Mutuel Wagering
content:
Chapter I - Division of Horse Racing and Pari-Mutuel Wagering

State Regulations

Subchapter A - Thoroughbred Racing (Article 1 to 3)

Subchapter B - Harness Racing (Part 4100 to 4123)

Subchapter C - State Quarter Horse Racing Commission (Part 4200 to 4237)

Subchapter D - Promotion Of Equine Research (Part 4250)

Subchapter E - Totalisator Systems (Part 4300)

Subchapter F - OFF-TRACK PARI-MUTUEL BETTING (Part 4400 to 4412)

Subchapter G - Account Wagering (Part 4500)

Subchapter H - Adjudicatory Proceedings For Racing (Part 4550)

Subchapter I - Housing (Part 4560)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
